result.execSummary:
The defendant Ashley S Beaton #404856 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Ashley S Beaton  #404856 in court, in custody with attorney David G Makovec.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court addresses defendant's letter requesting different counsel, Defendant would like to continue w/Atty, Defendant pleads guilty to Ct. 1, Judgment to be entered, 15 TR 6798 and 15 TR 6799 dismissed, Court sentences defendant to: $673.50 fine/costs, due in 60 days or payment plan, defendant to submit DNA sample,
Status conference on July 20, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
